description:
As a first-year student of the renowned Hyakkaou Private Academy, Mary Saotome knows her future is set for a one-way cruise to the top...

That is, until an encounter with an old-classmate-turned-housepet throws the newbie princess into the world of gambling! Can a normal girl like Mary make friends and survive debtless through only wit and luck? Find out in this prequel to the mega-popular Kakegurui!

(Source: Yen Press)
synonyms: โคตรเซียนโรงเรียนพนัน ภาค Twin

node.description: [Personal Website](http://2st.jp/500/) | [Website (Kawamoto Muno Studio)](https://kawamuno.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ushimilksan) Homura Kawamoto is a Japanese manga artist. Together with [Hikaru Muno](https://anilist.co/staff/128746/) they make up the studio Kawamoto Muno Studio.

He started his career at Studio Live working on outsourced episodes for a few years. His first major role was as mechanical designer on the short series [The Cosmopolitan Prayers](https://anilist.co/anime/112/).

After leaving Studio Live he was involved in several [Studio 4°C](https://anilist.co/studio/13/) and [MADHOUSE](https://anilist.co/studio/11/) projects, with the former studio housing his debut as director on the short TOYOTA commercial series [PES: Peace Eco Smiles](https://anilist.co/anime/13427/).

He's been affiliated with Studio [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/) since 2014 where he helmed his first TV Series, [Garo: The Animation](https://anilist.co/anime/20753/), and several other anime.

**Notable works outside anime:**

- Persona 5: Royal (Video Game, 2019) (OP Director, OP Storyboard, OP Key Animation)
Founder and representative director of Otonarium.

[Official Website](https://iris.dive2ent.com/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/iris-official-blog/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/iris_official_) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/iris.dive2.official) | [Ustream](http://www.ustream.tv/user/dive2iRis)

i☆Ris is an idol group formed by Avex in 2012 under the DIVE II Entertainment label. Its members are also seiyuu.

__Members:__
• [Saki Yamakita](https://anilist.co/staff/117183/Saki-Yamakita) (山北早紀) - Color: Green; (leader)
• [Yuu Serizawa](https://anilist.co/staff/116515/Yuu-Serizawa) (芹澤優) -  Color: Blue
• [Himika Akaneya](https://anilist.co/staff/119203/Himika-Akaneya) (茜屋日海夏) - Color: Purple
• [Yuki Wakai](https://anilist.co/staff/122697/Yuki-Wakai) (若井友希) - Color: Red
• [Miyu Kubota](https://anilist.co/staff/119204/Miyu-Kubota) (久保田未夢) - Color: Orange
• [Azuki Shibuya](https://anilist.co/staff/126076/Azuki-Shibuya) (澁谷梓希) - Color: Yellow (announced to graduate on March 31st, 2021.)

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hannahbuttel) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_hannahbuttel) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/hannah.buttel) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@HannahButtel)

Hannah Buttel is a Brazilian actress, voice actress, and dubbing director.

__Non-Anime Roles:__

- Katie Mitchell (The Mitchells vs. the Machines)
- Sue Sue Heck (The Middle)

- Jackeline "Jackie" Burkhart (2nd dub; That '70s Show)
- Diplomat Barbie (Barbie)

- Barbara Gordon / Batgirl (DC Super Hero Girls)
- Lily Loud (The Loud House)
- Sam Greenfield (Luck)
- Keelin Malraux (The Originals)
- Kitty Wilde (Glee)
- Sylvie Brett (Chicago Fire)
- Altiera "Alt" Cunningham (Cyberpunk 2077)

- Angel / 624 (Lilo & Stitch: The Series)

Dubbing director and audio engineer at Iyuno Poland.
Michiyoshi Minamisawa is a sound producer and the representative director of 81 Produce.
